use

  Reclusa::

  She studied her room for a moment. "=
AH, a spider will have her nest.
  Her way."  She started spinning web arou=
nd what would pass for light
  portals so it gave the effect of curtains.  =
She then looked at the
  bed. "Hmm, this will never do.  She spun webbing a=
round the four posts
  so it made a hammock suspended above the bed.  

  A=
fter nearly an hour, the room looked like a proper web nest.  Sure a
  bot =
could enter, but unless they had careful footing, they would get
  caught i=
n the strands.  She did leave part of the living room open and
  free of we=
b so that her leader and co-bots could sit comfortably in
  her quarters if=
 needs be. She looked about in complete satisfaction.
  "Ah, home sweet hom=
e. Now if I could only get a few maximal bodies to
  litter about the place=
 for aumbience, things would be just perfect.
  But the little touches coul=
d wait. She walked outside of her room and
  went to a wall com panel. "Per=
ceptor, please give me the directions to
  you. I wish to speak of a few...=
upgrades."
